collections.title: Students and Researchers Prompts
collections.description: ChatGPT prompts for students and researchers

promptTemplates.title: Research Paper Assistance
promptTemplates.content: Help me structure a research paper on {students_research_subject}.

promptTemplates.title: Study Guide Creation
promptTemplates.content: Create a study guide for {students_course_name} covering the following topics: {students_study_topics}.

promptTemplates.title: Data Analysis Explanation
promptTemplates.content: Explain how to perform a {students_analysis_type} analysis on a data set related to {students_data_subject}.
